text: Kampong Batu Ampar is a village in Pengkalan Batu, a mukim in Brunei-Muara District, Brunei. The postcode for Kampong Batu Ampar is BH1323. == Name == Kampong Batu Ampar comes from the same name in Malay which translates as 'Batu Ampar Village'. == References == Batu Ampar
title: Kampong Batu Ampar
